com.camerontec.util.datamodel.expression.compiler

Class CompilerFieldRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.datamodel.expression.compiler.CompilerFieldRepository

  • public final class CompilerFieldRepository
extends Object
    Field repository attached to the compilation context. The field repository is used during the various compilation phases to retrieve field information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExpressionDataType dataType(String field)
      Resolves the data type of the given field, which may be either represented by an integer key or a by name.
      int key(String field)
      Resolves the integer key of the given field, which may be either represented by an integer key or a by name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • key

        public int key(String field)
        Resolves the integer key of the given field, which may be either represented by an integer key or a by name.
        • If the field is represented using an integer key, then that integer key is returned.
        • If the field is represented using a field name and if that field is not present in the repository, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        field - an integer key or a field name
        Returns:
        the field's key
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given field is unknown

      • dataType

        public ExpressionDataType dataType(String field)
        Resolves the data type of the given field, which may be either represented by an integer key or a by name.
        • If the field is identified using an integer key and if that field is not present in the dictionary, then its data type is assumed to be ExpressionDataType.STRING
        • If the field is identified using a field name and if that field is not present in the dictionary, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        field - an integer key or a field name
        Returns:
        the field's data type
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given field name is unknown
